title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 582.7 - Traffic control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 582.7 - Traffic control

State Regulations
(a) Vehicle operators shall follow directives on posted signs as a standard of
safety and operation. (b) Tow-away
zones are identified by signs and/or surface markings. Any vehicle parked in
the places indicated will be towed away. (c) Speed limits. The maximum speed limit at which vehicles may proceed on
or along all roadways on the grounds of the State University College at New

Paltz is 20 MPH with the following exceptions: (1)

Fairview Road-15 MPH. (2)

Hasbrouck service road-15 MPH. (3)

College Hall (east side)-15
MPH. (4)

Scudder Road-15
MPH. (5)

Mohonk Avenue (east
side)-15 MPH. (6)

Adjoining village
roads-30 MPH. (d) The
following intersections on the grounds and borders of the campus are stop
intersections: Intersection
of

Direction of

Travel
(1) Tricor and Southside Avenues

Four-way
(2) Fairview Avenue to Loop South

South
(3) Loop Road and Elting Gym Extension

Three-way; East, South, North
(4) Loop Road and Scudder Road

Three-way; East, West, South
(5) Loop Road to Route 32 South

East
(6) East service building lot to Route 32

South

East
(7) West service building lot to Loop Road

North
(8) Haggerty Administration Building access road to

Route 32 South

East
(9) HAB lot to HAB Circle

South
(10) Scudder Road to HAB lot

East
(11) Mohonk Avenue to Route 32 South

East
(12) Plattekill Avenue to Route 32 South

East
(13) College Union Building lot to Mohonk

Avenue

South
(14) CUB lot to Plattekill Avenue

North
(15) Fairview Lot to Mohonk Avenue

North
(16) Old main building lot to Mohonk Avenue

South
(17) Tricor Avenue and Mohonk Avenue

Four-way
(18) Tricor Avenue and Hasbrouck Avenue

North and South
(19) Plattekill Avenue at Hasbrouck Avenue

West
(20) VanDenBerg Learning Center east service road
to Mohonk Avenue

South
(e) The following intersections are yield
intersections: Intersection
of

Direction of

Travel
(1) Modular Science Building to Loop Road

North
(2) Fairview Avenue to Mohonk Avenue

North
(3) Southside service building to west service
building lot

West
(f) The following roadways are for one-way
traffic: (1)

Hasbrouck service road westbound
(around curve to south). (2)

Scudder Road from SUB Tunnel to HAB lot-north only. (3)

Old main building circle-counterclockwise
only. (4)

VenDenBerg Learning

Center east service road-south only. (5)

Road between HAB Circle and Route 32
south-east only. (6)

Roadway
between HAB lot and HAB Circle-south only. (g) The following roadways are posted "NO
STANDING ANY TIME": all college roadways. Notes

582.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
